comments:
Description:
Use row or dataSetRow as value expression in onPrepare of dynamic text item will report error when preview.

Build number:2.1.2.v20061120

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a sample data source and dataset from table OFFICES.
2. Insert a dynamic text item, bind it to dataset, input
this.valueExpr=row["OFFICECODE"] in onPrepare method.
3. Preview

Expected result:
No exception

Actual result:
Exception when preview.

Error log:
 There are errors evaluating script "this.valueExpr=row["OFFICECODE"]". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
